command.name: add
command.help: add the specified files on the next commit

command.name: addremove
command.help: add all new files, delete all missing files

command.name: annotate
command.help: show changeset information by line for each file

command.name: archive
command.help: create an unversioned archive of a repository revision

command.name: backout
command.help: reverse effect of earlier changeset

command.name: bisect
command.help: subdivision search of changesets

command.name: bookmarks
command.help: track a line of development with movable markers

command.name: branch
command.help: set or show the gicurrent branch name

command.name: branches
command.help: list repository named branches

command.name: bundle
command.help: create a changegroup file

command.name: cat
command.help: output the current or given revision of files

command.name: clone
command.help: make a copy of an existing repository

command.name: commit
command.help: commit the specified files or all outstanding changes

command.name: copy
command.help: mark files as copied for the next commit

command.name: diff
command.help: diff repository (or selected files)

command.name: export
command.help: dump the header and diffs for one or more changesets

command.name: forget
command.help: forget the specified files on the next commit

command.name: graft
command.help: copy changes from other branches onto the current branch

command.name: grep
command.help: search for a pattern in specified files and revisions

command.name: heads
command.help: show branch heads

command.name: help
command.help: show help for a given topic or a help overview

command.name: identify
command.help: identify the working copy or specified revision

command.name: import
command.help: import an ordered set of patches

command.name: incoming
command.help: show new changesets found in source

command.name: init
command.help: create a new repository in the given directory

command.name: locate
command.help: locate files matching specific patterns

command.name: log
command.help: show revision history of entire repository or files

command.name: manifest
command.help: output the current or given revision of the project manifest

command.name: merge
command.help: merge working directory with another revision

command.name: outgoing
command.help: show changesets not found in the destination

command.name: parents
command.help: show the parents of the working directory or revision

command.name: paths
command.help: show aliases for remote repositories

command.name: phase
command.help: set or show the current phase name

command.name: pull
command.help: pull changes from the specified source

command.name: push
command.help: push changes to the specified destination

command.name: recover
command.help: roll back an interrupted transaction

command.name: remove
command.help: remove the specified files on the next commit

command.name: rename
command.help: rename files; equivalent of copy + remove

command.name: resolve
command.help: redo merges or set/view the merge status of files

command.name: revert
command.help: restore files to their checkout state

command.name: root
command.help: print the root (top) of the current working directory

command.name: serve
command.help: start stand-alone webserver

command.name: showconfig
command.help: show combined config settings from all hgrc files

command.name: status
command.help: show changed files in the working directory

command.name: summary
command.help: summarize working directory state

command.name: tag
command.help: add one or more tags for the current or given revision

command.name: tags
command.help: list repository tags

command.name: unbundle
command.help: apply one or more changegroup files

command.name: update
command.help: update working directory (or switch revisions)

command.name: verify
command.help: verify the integrity of the repository

command.name: version
command.help: output version and copyright information
